security.question: How secure is my data?
security.answer: We use bank-level encryption for data at rest and in transit. All data is stored in Canadian data centers and is fully PIPEDA and Loi 25 compliant.

data_residency.question: Where is my data stored?
data_residency.answer: All data is stored in Canadian data centers to ensure compliance with Canadian privacy laws and data residency requirements.

loi25.question: Are you compliant with Loi 25?
loi25.answer: Yes, we are fully compliant with Quebec's Loi 25 (Bill 64) including privacy impact assessments, breach notification procedures, and designated privacy officer.

pipeda.question: What about PIPEDA compliance?
pipeda.answer: We exceed PIPEDA requirements with explicit consent management, data minimization principles, and user rights for access, correction, and deletion.

stripe.question: How do payments work?
stripe.answer: We use Stripe for secure payment processing with PCI compliance. All transactions are processed in Canadian dollars with appropriate taxes.

export.question: Can I export my data?
export.answer: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in standard formats (CSV, PDF, JSON) with no vendor lock-in.

limits.question: What happens if I hit my plan limits?
limits.answer: You'll receive notifications at 80% usage. You can upgrade anytime or purchase add-ons. Your data is never lost - just temporarily limited until the next billing cycle.

integrations.question: What integrations are available?
integrations.answer: We support Google Drive and One Drive import/export. We're continuously adding new integrations based on customer feedback.

accuracy.question: How accurate is the AI extraction?
accuracy.answer: Our AI achieves 99.5% accuracy on standard business documents. Confidence scores are provided for all extractions, and you can always review and correct results.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: Free plans get email support. Pro plans include priority email support. Business and Teams plans include phone support with dedicated account managers.
